item.description:
TONIGHT...let's meet up at the Liberty Hotel in The Yard again for drinks and a movie.

An ideal evening to be outside and hang out in a cool setting...enjoying the company of friendly fun folks.

Mystic River is the film , which is an intense crime, drama mystery and thriller. Plot: With a childhood tragedy that overshadowed their lives, three men are reunited by circumstance when one loses a daughter. This highly acclaimed film, directed by Clint Eastwood, was shot in Boston....starring Kevin Bacon, Tim Robbins, Sean Penn, Marcia Gay Harden and Laurence Fishburne.

Get on the guest list by emailing moviemondays@libertyhotel.com



Courtyard Menu

Cocktail Menu

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Charles/MGH (red line) is the closest subway station. Government (green & blue lines) is less than a ten (10) minute walk.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the doorman at the hotel entrance to direct you to the Courtyard...find me seated at the picnic table on the left playing solitaire.
item.name: Tonight - Drinks and a Movie at Liberty Hotel - Monday July 12th
